articles.title: ETFs are popular with younger investors. So, what are exchange traded funds all about? - ABC News
articles.description: What on Earth are ETFs? Well, they're proving to be the most popular way for 18-24-year-olds to start out in trading. Just ask Jasmine, who's using this method to build up her first home deposit.
articles.content:
For some, a new year (and new resolutions) means finally getting around to investing in the stock market.
A popular choice for many first-time investors is a type of investment called exchange trade… [+4184 chars]
